__e: Apparently, there's a secret service agent named Aaron Pierce who knows a little more than he should.
I told Pierce I just want to be with him.
You told Dr. Pierce the last time you took the drug was at your last session.
And it doesn't help that Pierce, Jesse, and I can't seem to get on the same page...
Anyone else think the quicker we find Pierce's place and get out of here, the better?
Now, I want you to find Agent Pierce, and I want you to get him back here, right now!
Look, Pierce, I'm sorry, but he was available, we had an opening, and I made a call.
When Pierce asked about your mother, I felt like I was being hit by a car.
Pierce told me not to go in there.
the watch that I bought him.
Pierce has got enough friends. He doesn't need our help.
Maybe Pierce needs a dad, I don't.
Well, Pierce, I'm not sure that I want to get it, and I think you ought to take a break from these new friends of yours.
I'm about to get the only A I will ever get, and Pierce isn't even dying.
You won't tell me, Pierce won't tell me.
